# percentComplete

**Instance Property**

Returns the percentage of completion for an interactive transition when it moves to its noninteractive phase.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var percentComplete: CGFloat { get }
```

## Return Value

The percentage of completion when an interactive transition moves to its noninteractive completion phase.

## Discussion

Use this value to determine how much of the interactive transition completed before the transition was canceled or moved to its final animations.

## Getting the behavior attributes

- **presentationStyle**: The presentation style to use for the transition.
- **transitionDuration**: Returns the noninteractive duration of a transition.
- **completionCurve**: Returns the completion curve associated with the transition.
- **completionVelocity**: Returns the starting velocity to use for any final animations.
